# Forums

General questions about CHoRUS can be asked on the [CHoRUS Discussion Forum](https://github.com/orgs/chorus-ai/discussions).

Note that there are discussion locations for specific questions pertaining to [Standards](https://github.com/chorus-ai/StandardsModule/discussions) and [Data Acquisition](https://github.com/chorus-ai/data_acq_SOP/discussions)

# Bug reports

Bug reports should be files using the issue tracker of the misbehaving package:

- [chorus-extract-upload issue tracker](https://github.com/chorus-ai/chorus-extract-upload/issues)

- [chorus-container-apps issue tracker](https://github.com/chorus-ai/chorus-container-apps/issues)

- [CHoRUSReports issue tracker](https://github.com/chorus-ai/CHoRUSReports/issues)

- [CADA issue tracker](https://github.com/chorus-ai/CADA/issues)

- [IVe issue tracker](https://github.com/chorus-ai/IVe/issues)

- [privacy_scan_tool issue tracker](https://github.com/chorus-ai/privacy_scan_tool/issues)

- [chorus_waveform issue tracker](https://github.com/chorus-ai/chorus_waveform/issues)

- [chorus_imaging issue tracker](https://github.com/chorus-ai/chorus_imaging/issues)
